Articles.Content:
![ufKTTaA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ufKTTaA.jpg)

It has over 2000 units of fuel for two engines, cruises at over 320 m/s, and is very stable and easy to take off and land.

This jet is rather pretty.

This is a fun jet to fly.

Tailstrikes are almost nonexistent.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/0ph68kpk9780z6s/F-5A.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0ph68kpk9780z6s/F-5A.craft?dl=0)

![ctYWefu.png](http://i.imgur.com/ctYWefu.png)

![vEL9e76.png](http://i.imgur.com/vEL9e76.png)

![cF5nr6d.png](http://i.imgur.com/cF5nr6d.png)

![ZQS3zKR.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZQS3zKR.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-24T22:38:26Z" title="05/24/2015 10:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 24, 2015</time> by andrew123**

> 
> nice replica!
> does it preform?

Over 320 m/s sea level cruising speed, 9-14 G maneuverability and over 2000 units of fuel for two engines paired with excellent stability. She performs well and is easy to fly.

I say this is better than the phantom for its simplicity and greater range. It can also fly at tree top level altitude without crashing.
Pardon me, the one in the pic is a F-5E Tiger II... (Top Gun's MiG-28 for old kids like me).

> 
> Pardon me, the one in the pic is a F-5E Tiger II... (Top Gun's MiG-28 for old kids like me).

That just gave me an idea.

Nice! +rep

Those intakes though! So big!

> 
> Nice! +rep
> Those intakes though! So big!

Then perhaps it's time to "suggest" to squad to add 0.6 m intakes and 0.6 m jets. You know, a very kind "suggestion" filled with hype trains. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D
